DROP DATABASE IF EXISTS sensoresdb;
CREATE DATABASE sensoresdb;
USE sensoresdb;

CREATE TABLE user(
	id int AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
	password varchar(25),
	token varchar(25),
	role varchar(10),
	username varchar(50) 
);

CREATE TABLE concentrador(
	id int AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
	area varchar(25),
	id_user int,
	FOREIGN KEY(id_user) REFERENCES user(id)
);

CREATE TABLE sensor(
	id int AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
	area varchar(25),
	id_concentrador int,
	FOREIGN KEY(id_concentrador) REFERENCES concentrador(id)
);

CREATE TABLE dado(
	id int AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
	unidade varchar(1),
	valor float,
	id_sensor int,
	timestamp timestamp,
	FOREIGN KEY(id_sensor) REFERENCES sensor(id) 
);
